cab.content: (P 4484) From Viceroy, Foreign Department, 5th June 1920.(Received 6 p.m.)Clear the line.693. Following from l)obbs (? Mussoorie): " Tarsi wrote last night agreeing to resume conversations on Monday without further demur. Communique on which he and I have jointly agreed follows en clair and will be issued here to-day."Text of communique will follow.
